subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Television
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The interview that Jerry Sandusky, who is accused in the Penn State child molestation scandal, gave to Bob Costas of NBC was one of the more disturbing and damaging attempts at spin control in recent memory.
snippet: The interview that Jerry Sandusky, who is accused in the Penn State child molestation scandal, gave to Bob Costas of NBC was one of the more disturbing and damaging attempts at spin control in recent memory.
